column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou's also had spinach bread
column2: cheese balls (don't knock em til you've tried em) and fried zucchini. Not to slight Gino's
column3: Ginos does have the bomb fried spinach sticks
column4: but the grease is heavy and you can tell they fry the spinach sticks
column5: cheese sticks and whatever else they fry in the same grease. Ew
